CustomField.formula:
IF( Opportunity.Propriedade_da_conta__c == 'PRIVADO' || Opportunity.Propriedade_da_conta__c == '', IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'COMITED', TotalPrice, IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'WIN', 0, IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'UPSIDE HIGH', IF(Opportunity.Probability > 90, TotalPrice, 0), 0))), /* UPSIDE, OPEN e demais est√°gios = 0 */
IF(Opportunity.Propriedade_da_conta__c == 'PUBLICO' || Opportunity.Propriedade_da_conta__c == 'FILANTROPIA', IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'WIN', 0, IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'COMITED' && TEXT(Opportunity.Sub_Fase__c) != 'GARANTIDO', TotalPrice * 0.4, IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'COMITED' && TEXT(Opportunity.Sub_Fase__c) = 'GARANTIDO', TotalPrice, IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'UPSIDE HIGH', TotalPrice * 0.2, IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'UPSIDE', TotalPrice * 0.1, IF(TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) = 'OPEN', TotalPrice * 0, TotalPrice * 0)))))), null) )
CustomField.label: Forecast Item
